name: type-mark
description: A small library for checking types

scripts.build: browserify --standalone type ./src/index.js > type-mark.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output type-mark.min.js -- type-mark.js
scripts.test: npm run build && nyc mocha --reporter dot --timeout=30000 --recursive test --bail
scripts.site: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve

author: Eric Buss <ejrbuss@gmail.com>
